arts.ttl: Milan Facing Stern Competition from German Powerhouse for Marcus Rashford
arts.sum: Bundesliga giants Borussia Dortmund are reportedly taking concrete steps to beat Milan and Barcelona to Marcus Rashford's signature. According to the Daily Mail, the Germans have identified the out-of-favor Manchester United forward as a perfect replacement for Donyell Malen. The post Milan Facing Stern Competition from German Powerhouse for Marcus Rashford appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Walker wanted by AC Milan, MLS clubs
arts.sum: Clubs from Serie A, MLS and Saudi Arabia are all keen on wantaway Man City defender Kyle Walker. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund make major effort in attempt to sign Marcus Rashford as they look to beat AC Milan and Barcelona to Man United star
arts.sum: More talks are planned this week with Rashford's entourage but the Bundesliga side have a good relationship with Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Milan 1-1 Cagliari: Match Report
arts.sum: AC Milan's bright start under new manager Sergio Conceicao hit a snag as they were held to a 1-1 draw by Cagliari at the San Siro. The result comes as a disappointment for the Rossoneri, who were looking to build on their recent Supercoppa Italiana triumph. The post Serie A | Milan 1-1 Cagliari: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Man Utd reunion at AC Milan: Ibrahimovic teases Rashford signing
arts.sum: Zlatan Ibrahimovic has claimed that 'everyone wants to play for Milan ' when quizzed about his club's links with former Manchester United teammate Marcus Rashford . Man Utd reunion at AC Milan: Ibrahimovic teases Rashford signing

arts.ttl: Milan in Talks for Salzburg Midfielder Lucas Gourna-Douath
arts.sum: AC Milan have entered negotiations for Lucas Gourna-Douath, the young French midfielder currently playing for Red Bull Salzburg. The 21-year-old has caught the eye of the Rossoneri management as they look to strengthen their midfield options in the January transfer window. The post Milan in Talks for Salzburg Midfielder Lucas Gourna-Douath appeared first on FootItalia.com.
